item.title: AMBA accreditation awarded to India's IIMC
item.description: The Indian Institute of Management Calcutta (IIMC) has received a five-year accreditation from the Association of MBAs (AMBA) for its MBA and MBM programs. Anindya Sen, Dean of IIMC, stated that the institute aims to secure a distinct global standing. “AMBA accreditation will enhance our international visibility and establish us as a global institution, enabling us to attract more international students. We will also receive valuable guidance for continuous improvement,” he explained.
